name: Abrasive
description: The character rubs people the wrong way.

name: Anathema
description: The character suffers direct harm when exposed to a particular substance.

name: Audience
description: Many people follow the character's work and treat them with the respect they deserve.

name: Battle Ready
description: The character is always mentally prepared for any sort of trouble to start.

name: Beguiling
description: The character has an edge when making an Ego check to persuade someone who could be attracted to them.

name: Berserker
description: The character often loses control of their temper.

name: Big
description: The character's size is big, which applies -1 to their Melee and Agility defenses, adds +1 to their Run Speed, and increases their reach to 2.

name: Bloodthirsty
description: The character likes hurting people—even killing them.

name: Breathe Different
description: The character cannot breathe Earth's air for long.

name: Clinician
description: The character has an edge on Logic (medicine) checks to determine what is medically wrong with someone they examine.

name: Clueless
description: The character tends to shut out things they're not entirely focused on.

name: Combat Expert
description: The character knows how to handle themselves better than most.

name: Combat Finesse
description: The character can add their Agility rather than their Melee to Fight attack checks.

name: Combat Reflexes
description: The character can react quickly in combat.

name: Combat Trickery
description: Once per battle, when attacking, the character can turn the Marvel die into a 1.

name: Connections
description: The character knows someone with access to and knowledge of a particular field.

name: Dealmaker
description: The character is skilled at the art of negotiation.

name: Debate Champ
description: The character can use their Logic instead of their Ego with Ego (persuasion) and Ego (intimidation) checks.

name: Determination
description: The character never gives up, even when they feel like they're at their worst.

name: Eidetic Memory
description: The character rarely forgets anything.

name: Enduring Constitution
description: The character can function for up to 48 hours without sleep and has an edge on Resilience checks to overcome fatigue or weariness.

name: Enhanced Physique
description: The character is stronger than regular humans.

name: Extra Occupation
description: The character has a busy life and has done all sorts of things.

name: Extraordinary Origin
description: The character has an additional origin.

name: Famous
description: The character is widely known—at least among a certain group of people or a population.

name: Fearless
description: The character is extremely brave.

name: First Aid
description: The character knows how to administer first aid.

name: Font of Information
description: The character has an edge on Logic checks having to do with knowledge.

name: Free Running
description: The character has an edge on Agility checks made to perform acrobatics during a movement action.

name: Fresh Eyes
description: The character has their own way of doing things.

name: Gearhead
description: The character knows their way around machines.

name: Glibness
description: The character can strike up a conversation with anyone at any time and can often convince them to lend a hand.

name: God Heritage
description: The character - or at least one of their ancestors - is a god.

name: Gullible
description: The character is easy to fool.

name: Honest
description: The character is a terrible liar.

name: Infamous
description: The character is widely known and generally disliked—at least among a certain group of people or a population.

name: Interrogation
description: The character knows how to ask the right questions in the right way.

name: Inventor
description: The character is good at coming up with solutions on the fly.

name: Investigation
description: The character is an expert investigator, trained in the arts of forensic science.

name: Iron Will
description: Enemies have trouble on attacks to control the character's mind or influence their behavior.

name: Legal Eagle
description: The character knows the laws of their homeland and can help others navigate them.

name: Leverage
description: The character is good at figuring out what people want and using it against them.

name: Loner
description: The character does not play well with others.

name: Massive
description: The character's size is Big.

name: Monster
description: The character is some kind of monster, often of a type spoken of in legend.

name: Out of Shape
description: The character is in poor physical condition.

name: Piloting
description: The character knows how to operate vehicles of all kinds.

name: Presence
description: The character knows how to command attention on demand.

name: Public Speaking
description: The character knows how to get the attention of a crowd, whether that's at a political rally or in front of a jury or a classroom.

name: Pundit
description: The character knows how to break news items and put them into context to craft a story around them.

name: Quick Learner
description: If the character fails an action check, they gain an edge on the check if they try the same action again on their next turn.

name: Regal
description: The character seems born to be in charge.

name: Scientific Expertise
description: The character has extensive scientific training.

name: Signature Attack
description: The character is known for favoring a particular kind of weapon or attack power.

name: Situational Awareness
description: The character is trained to always keep an eye out for trouble.

name: Skeptical
description: The character is hard to fool.

name: Small
description: The character's size is small, which adds +1 to their Melee and Agility defenses and takes -1 from their Run Speed.

name: Sneaky
description: The character has an edge on Agility checks when sneaking around.

name: Stranger
description: The character doesn't understand local customs.

name: Surprising Power
description: The character can choose a power they normally wouldn't be able to use.

name: Tech Reliance
description: The character relies on technology for powers.

name: Weakness
description: The character suffers an unusual amount of harm from certain substances.

name: Weird
description: The character has something weird (or even wonderful) about them.
